aboutSection.title: About us
aboutSection.companyName: Senat Consulting — a legal and consulting company
aboutSection.companyDescription: uniting experienced lawyers and project organization specialists. We carefully study each case, develop a strategy, and bring the matter to a result — from negotiations and document preparation to court decisions.

portfolio.title: Our recent cases
portfolio.case6Title: We’ll help organize your event and provide top-level legal support.

contactForm.commentsPlaceholder: Describe your situation or ask a question

courtsAndDisputes.title: Courts and Disputes
courtsAndDisputes.h5: "We go all the way for our clients"
courtsAndDisputes.details1: We represent clients' interests in courts of all instances - from district courts to cassation and supervisory authorities. We assist in preparing statements of claim, objections, appeals, and cassation complaints, and conduct comprehensive legal examination of documents.
courtsAndDisputes.details2: We provide full preparation for court hearings: evidence collection, witness preparation, interaction with experts, and representation in enforcement proceedings. We also offer strategic consulting on risk minimization and preparation for potential disputes.

businessRegistration.title: Business Registration
businessRegistration.details1: We help incorporate companies, prepare founding documents, and establish legal support for businesses from scratch. We analyze business models to select the optimal legal form (LLC, Sole Proprietorship, JSC, etc.) and assist with registration in government authorities.
businessRegistration.details2: We provide services for preparing document packages, registration with tax authorities, registration with funds, obtaining licenses and permits. We consult on tax optimization, selection of taxation systems, and development of corporate procedures.

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.details1: We develop and review contracts of any complexity: supply, contract work, lease, agency, and commercial agreements. We conduct legal examination of terms, risk assessment, and preparation of additional agreements and guarantee mechanisms.
contracts.details2: We provide individual term development, including clauses on liability, force majeure, confidentiality, and dispute resolution procedures. We help coordinate text with counterparties and consult on performance and amendment of contractual obligations.

businessSupport.title: Business Support
businessSupport.details1: We provide comprehensive legal support for company activities: HR matters, corporate documentation, interaction with regulatory authorities. We ensure legal support for daily operations and strategic decisions.
businessSupport.details2: We provide subscription-based support, preparation of local acts, contracts and procedures, as well as compliance audits. We help implement internal regulations and conduct employee training on legal matters.

projectsAndFestivals.title: Project and Festival Organization
projectsAndFestivals.details1: Legal support for event organization: preparing contracts with contractors, artists, and partners, formalizing content rights and intellectual property work. We help minimize risks associated with organizer liability.
projectsAndFestivals.details2: We support the process of obtaining permits, provide recommendations on event insurance and development of safety regulations. We provide support in disputes with contractors, on copyright issues, and when interacting with government authorities.

servicesPage.expire: years of experience in this field
servicesPage.subtitle: Our areas of work

starterPlan.title: Starter Plan
starterPlan.description: Consultation on basic legal issues, preparation of standard documents, and support for simple cases.

basicPlan.title: Basic Plan
basicPlan.description: Extended legal support, including document preparation, representation in first-instance courts, and dispute consultations.

advancedPlan.title: Advanced Plan
advancedPlan.description: Full legal package: protection of interests in complex cases, court appeals, comprehensive support for businesses and private clients.

ContactPage.contactsDescription: We provide professional legal services for individuals and organizations. Our team of experienced lawyers is ready to assist you with consultations, document preparation, and representation in court. Contact us in any convenient way and receive qualified help in resolving your legal issues.
